name: Fluffy Birds
description:
Watch out: The cuddly Fluffy Birds are around! Cuteness to the max!
This game is highly recommended to all fans of puzzle and match three games!

MANY HOURS OF MATCH THREE PUZZLE FUN
Fluffy Birds is cute, cuddly and easy to play. Shift and slide entire rows and columns to form groups of 3 or more like-colored birdies.

THREE FLUFFY GAME MODES
Try to collect all 12 eggs, and beat the timer in CASUAL mode. Sit back, relax and simply enjoy the Fluffy Birds in RELAXATION mode. Train your brain with 20 different challenging puzzles in PUZZLE mode. Can you solve them all?

CUTE MENUS
Have you recognized the Fluffy Birds sitting on the menu items? See what happens if you shake your device. ;-)

FLUFFY FEATURES
• Many hours of match three and puzzle fun!
• 3 different game modes: Casual, Relaxation and Puzzle
• 20 different mind-bending puzzles
• Cute and cuddly artwork with Retina display support
• Game Center leaderboards
• Game Center achievements
• Interactive menus
• HD Version for iPad available, too

More exciting card and puzzle games by GameDuell:
•Fluffy HD (paid & awesome for iPad)
•Cleopatra´s Pyramid (free for iPhone)
•Cleopatra´s Pyramid HD (paid & awesome for iPad)

Questions or comments:
Visit our support page https://gameduell.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/sections/200313806-Fluffy-on-Mobile or drop us a message via iphone-support@gameduell.com

Please note that we cannot respond to reviews and criticism directly in the app store, so please use the support email iphone-support@gameduell.com, if you need assistance or have suggestions for improving our app. We would love to hear from you personally.

Please remember to rate us 5 stars any time an update is available! Thanks for playing Fluffy Birds!
